channel.title: BM Europe Meet-Up
channel.description:
So I have been wondering about this a while.
I thought it'd be awesome to have a BM meetup with all the people living in Europe and/or around it. I am kind of wondering who'd join because if some people are coming I would volunteer to organize it.
So: who's game?

item.description:

Give us the make, and I’ll see it done!

item.title: BM Europe Meet-Up
item.dc:creator: Steppenwolf
item.description:
Kaze:

You mean some of you actually have the desire to meet with members of this forum in person?

You all manage to sicken me enough with text. I might be inclined to kill one of you if I actually had to bear witness to your failure-in-motion.

You heard it people, big party at Kaze’s house!

Read full topic

item.title: BM Europe Meet-Up
item.dc:creator: Flatline
item.description:
I’d say about 20% of the locals in Birmingham actually speak in the strong accent you associate with Birmingham. Less so in the centre where it benefits (?) from being a University city. Having said that, I’d be happy for a jaunt up North as I’ve yet to experience the delights of a night out in Manchester.

Read full topic

item.title: BM Europe Meet-Up

item.description:
Manchester would be awesome. Brum could be cool, but the big problem there is Brummies. I might have to wear ear plugs and rely on the rest of you guys to do any communication with locals. The Brummie accent might be enough to trigger a psychotic episode in me.

item.title: BM Europe Meet-Up
item.dc:creator: Gom_Jabbar
item.description:
well im not far away, its more that its a cental location for the uk lot. It depends if people fancy the trip. But if theres more notherners and internnational visitors prefer a diffrent venue then im not against that. I just think its a strong candidate bieng in the middle.
Either way it has the potencial to be a hell of an intresting night.

item.title: BM Europe Meet-Up
item.dc:creator: Siggs
item.description:
Gom _Jabbar:

I say brum personally it’s got an international airport and its a nice central location for British and and Ireland Bm users and it does have some great nights out. despite some opinions

I’d be game with this, It’s like, not even an hour on the train. If there are’s a decent amount of active forum goers there.
.

Read full topic
